holidays.title: Autism Sunday
holidays.description: Take time to say a prayer today for those affected by autism spectrum disorders.

holidays.title: Laugh and Get Rich Day
holidays.description: Laugh yourself into better spirits and enrich your health and happiness today!

holidays.title: Man Day
holidays.description: Fathers, friends, colleagues, and gym buddies — celebrate every man in your life on Man Day.

holidays.title: Molasses Bar Day
holidays.description: A homemade molasses bar is the perfect way to celebrate this sweet day.

holidays.title: Mother's Day Norway
holidays.description: This day is a special family holiday to celebrate mothers and wives.

holidays.title: National Boy Scout Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the trustworthy, loyal, helpful, friendly, courteous, and brave boy scouts.

holidays.title: National Homegating Day
holidays.description: National Homegating Day is for Super Bowl Sunday fans who cannot be at the games personally.

holidays.title: National Iowa Day
holidays.description: It’s the day to remember the Hawkeye State and its rich contributions to American history.

holidays.title: National Kite-Flying Day
holidays.description: The wind in your face, and the liberating feeling of flying a kite.

holidays.title: Opera Day
holidays.description: Opera is one of the oldest and finest forms of entertainment. Today, we celebrate it!

holidays.title: Prešeren Day
holidays.description: Bring on your best mood as we celebrate one of the greatest men in history.

holidays.title: Propose Day
holidays.description: Love’s in the air. Get down on one knee and do the deed this Propose Day.

holidays.title: Scout Sunday
holidays.description: We celebrate the Scout’s oath and law which helps adolescents reach their full potential!

holidays.title: Super Chicken Wing Day
holidays.description: It’s time to put that appetite to the test with Super Chicken Wing Day!

holidays.title: World Marriage Day
holidays.description: Today, we reflect on the beautiful gift of marriage and celebrate enduring love!

holidays.title: Charlie Axel Woods’s Birthday
holidays.description: This second-generation golfer is stepping out of his father’s shadow and making a name for himself.

holidays.title: I.N’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is a vocalist and a people’s favorite, both within the group and among the fans.

holidays.title: Jaden Hossler’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's not just a TikTok star, but also a talented singer. Nothing stops him from success.

holidays.title: Klay Thompson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Thompson is widely considered one of the best shooters in N.B.A. history.

holidays.title: Shereen Jenkins’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are celebrating Jenkins — a self-taught dancer who worked hard to perfect the art of dancing.
